message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I'm really interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $160.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $160 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.
I'm still not willing to go as low as $140, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'll sell the product to you for $155.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $155 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $145 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $150, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, but $150 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $150, Bob. I think we've had a good negotiation, but I'm going to have to pass on selling to you. I'm going to sell the product to someone else.
